frontmatter.title: The From-scratch guide to building a static website with Gatsby - and serving it on GitHub pages
frontmatter.excerpt: In this day and age, it seems everyone has a blog. And there are many platforms that will help you build one.

frontmatter.title: Running Clustering Tests for WSO2 Message Broker
frontmatter.excerpt: In this post, let us setup a cluster of two nodes running WSO2 Message Broker 3.0.0 and run clustering tests on them. These steps can be used to setup a cluster of MB 3.2.0 as well.
